attributes.action: get BBC3 to show a Neighbours omnibus on sunday mornings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many of the hard working folk of this nation frequently get home from a hard day at the office to find that they have missed the evening screening of Neighbours to such an extent that Hollyoaks is into its second half. It is not fair that we should be punished for working hard by being forced to miss our daily hit of Neighbours fun. This needs to be remedied immediately! I propose a neighbours omnibus to be screened on BBC3 on Sundays. Because lets face it, everybody needs good neighbours.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
